_sText:
Hello,

this map is based on the original map hosites_antarctica.
i remade my map because it caused fps drop and i wanted to add some things
the layout is totally different.

this map includes:
- a shot for shot area
- a lava river
- a gun toss ramp
- 4 cells
- a couple watch places for the ct's
- a rebellion path for t's
- chicken arena

the only things that are similar are the themed cells.
there are 24 ct slots and 28 terrorist slots for any servers that have a lot of slots.
i made this map by myself.

Special Thanks to:

karatek√§fer - skybox
Graytap - ice textures
icecreamlock - color textures

-----Version 2-----

there is a race added
the t spawn is redone
and there is a secret room that was added
also, you cant glitch the cells either.
the s4s had added detail.

-----Version 3-----
fixed secret room
added equipable skins in secret room
cant shoot through walls in t spawn
the numbers for race dont leave debris behind
lava jumps

-----FINAL-----
trex
some other things

-----FINAL 2 -----
NO SECRET. DUE TO A LOT OF COMPLAINTS.
